name: Axiom
headline: The Gateway to DeFi
description: We're building the first platform that centralizes all of DeFi trading. Trade any asset on any chain without all the complications in between.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:crypto-web3; industry:consumer-finance; industry:trading; industry:cryptocurrency; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Henry Zhang, Founder
founders.description: CEO @ Axiom. Graduated at 20 with 1 exit, excited by all things crypto!

# The Gateway to DeFi
Axiom is the only trading platform you'll ever need.
[Start Trading](https://axiom.trade/</discover>)
Backed by
[![Y Combinator](https://axiom.trade/images/landing-page/y-combinator-brand.svg)](https://axiom.trade/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Advanced Features to Streamline Your Trading.From wallet tracking to real-time analytics, we've got you covered.
Order Execution EngineTrade with confidence.
Wallet and Twitter TrackerTrade and track all in one place.
Hyperliquid PerpetualsTrade leveraged Perps.
YieldEarn while you sleep.
Land in ≤ 1 Block
Our limit order execution engine is the fastest in the market.With our proprietary order execution engine and colocated nodes, our limit orders land in ≤ 1 block.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Migration Sniper
Buy and sell any migrating token, landing in ≤ 1 block.With our migration sniper, you're never too late to the party. Be the first to get in or secure profits.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
No MEV Triggers
Never get your limit orders triggered by MEV again.Axiom utilizes MEV-resistant execution paths with frontrunning and sandwiching protection, meaning your limit orders are safe with us.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Auto-Strategies
Set your entire trading strategy in motion with a single click.Advanced trading strategies lets you buy and place your limit orders in one click. We'll handle the rest.

Try Advanced Ordering
RewardsGet paid to trade.
RewardsEarn SOL from trading.
![Rewards notification](https://axiom.trade/images/landing-page/notification-reward.webp)
Progress through the RanksEarn higher reward rates.
![Rank rewards illustration](https://axiom.trade/images/landing-page/ranks-rewards.webp)
ReferralsEarn points and SOL from your friends.
![Referral rewards](https://axiom.trade/images/landing-page/referral-rewards.webp)
Axiom PointsEarn points through trading, referrals, and quests.
![Axiom points](https://axiom.trade/images/landing-page/axiom-points.webp)
Architecture
Integrations
Axiom integrates all the different protocols and applications you use, giving you a seamless trading experience.
![Integration illustration](https://axiom.trade/images/landing-page/integrations.webp)
Non-Custodial
The Axiom wallet is fully non-custodial, secured by Turnkey's scalable infrastructure for managing private keys across blockchains. With air-gapped architecture, it ensures robust security, seamless recovery, and protection from vulnerabilities.
![Non-custodial security illustration](https://axiom.trade/images/landing-page/non-custodial.webp)
FAQ
What is Axiom?
Axiom is a trading platform designed to be the only application you need to trade onchain. We offer a suite a integrations that allow you to trade the hottest assets, all in one place.
How secure is Axiom?
Axiom uses industry-leading security measures including non-custodial infrastructure, secure key management, and encryption to ensure your security. To learn more about our wallet infrastructure, visit our partner [Turnkey](https://axiom.trade/<https:/www.turnkey.com/>).
Can I buy crypto on Axiom?
Yes, through our partnership with [Coinbase](https://axiom.trade/<https:/www.coinbase.com/>), Axiom users have the ability to buy up to $500 worth of crypto per week, no-KYC.
How does Axiom offer yield?
Axiom offers a seamless way to earn passive income. We offer up to 15% APY on your assets, with instant withdrawals. To learn more, visit our partner [Marginfi](https://axiom.trade/<https:/marginfi.com/>).
Is Axiom decentralized?
Yes, Axiom is decentralized. We integrate directly with decentralized protocols and applications. Your funds and transactions are fully onchain and your funds are always in your control.
![Background](https://axiom.trade/images/landing-page/last-section.webp)
Optimize Your Trades with the Right Tools[Launch Axiom](https://axiom.trade/</discover>)

generated_description:
**Axiom**: Your Gateway to DeFi

Launched in 2024 and hailing from the innovative environment of Y Combinator's Batch W25, Axiom is positioned to redefine cryptocurrency trading as we know it. Based in the heart of San Francisco, this nimble startup initially set out to create a comprehensive platform that centralizes DeFi trading across various blockchains, allowing users to trade any asset seamlessly while avoiding the complexity typically associated with crypto transactions.

### What Axiom Offers

Axiom is not just another trading platform; it’s designed to be your all-in-one solution for DeFi trading with a robust suite of features that include:

- **Advanced Order Execution**: A proprietary order execution engine ensures limit orders land in ≤ 1 block, offering unmatched speed and reliability.
- **Non-Custodial Security**: Axiom wallets are fully non-custodial, secured by Turnkey’s scalable infrastructure. Your funds remain under your control, ensuring peace of mind.
- **High Yield**: Users can earn up to 15% APY on assets with instant withdrawals, making Axiom not just a trading platform but also a place to grow your wealth passively.
- **User-Friendly Integrations**: By seamlessly integrating various protocols and applications, Axiom offers a unified experience, whether you’re tracking wallets or executing trades.
- **Protection Against Frontrunning**: Its MEV-resistant execution paths protect your limit orders from being triggered by malicious actors looking to disrupt market fairness.

### The Team

Currently, Axiom operates with a lean team of just two dedicated members, highlighting their commitment to agility and efficiency. Notably, they are backed by Tom Blomfield, a respected Group Partner at Y Combinator. 

### Why Axiom?

If you're looking for a trading experience that's as intuitive as it is powerful, Axiom’s platform aims to be the only place you’ll need for on-chain trading. They tackle common pain points in the DeFi world and offer solutions that foster trust and enable users to thrive in the fast-paced crypto landscape.

For those ready to trade or just explore, Axiom welcomes you to start your journey at [axiom.trade](https://axiom.trade).

--- 

In a nutshell, Axiom is setting the groundwork for the future of DeFi trading. It's about simplifying complex processes and putting the user in control—no more hassle, just straightforward trading. This is a company to watch as it navigates the evolving landscape of cryptocurrency and finance.
